software.name: opencms
software.installation_report_template:
goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/opencms/setup/

Setup Connection
User root
password set  for mysql root (can reset via mysql_server configuration link)
OpenCms Connection 	
Database User _Engines_Environment(dbuser)
Database Password _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd) 
Connection String jdbc:mysql://_Engines_Environment(dbhost):3306/
Database  _Engines_Environment(dbname)

Will ask to drop existing database
yes

Follow the wizard
Leave MAC Address
URL _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
Server name as you like
The import of modules takes a while
